description:
Solve the **Number of Connected Components in an Undirected Graph** problem.

Given n nodes (labeled 0 to n-1) and a list of undirected edges, return the number of connected components in the graph.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/number-of-connected-components-in-an-undirected-graph/).

examples.explanation: All nodes connected in one component.
